data.Title: Google Confirms Core Updates Impact AI Overviews
data.Description: Google's John Mueller has confirmed that core updates impact the search engine's AI-powered overviews, meaning websites that see ranking changes due to a core update may also see their AI overviews change.

data.Title: Baidu Blocks Google and Bing From Scraping Content
data.Description: Wikipedia-style service Baidu Baike has barred the search engine crawlers of Google and Bing from indexing its online content, highlighting the increasing demand for AI data.

data.Title: Perplexity Plans to Launch Ads in Q4
data.Description: AI search startup Perplexity has revealed plans to win over advertisers later this year with new cross-platform formats and a CPM pricing model.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update: Gains and Reversals Reported
data.Description: Google's August 2024 core update is still rolling out, with some sites hit by the helpful content update seeing surges in traffic, while others experience reversals.

data.Title: Google Analytics Experiences Data Outage
data.Description: Google Analytics experienced a temporary outage, with users reporting missing data for August 22nd and 23rd, 2024.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Migration Scheduled for September
data.Description: Google is migrating all merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September 2024.

data.Title: Hardbacon Experiences Traffic Quadrupling After Bankruptcy Announcement
data.Description: Hardbacon, a Canadian personal finance website, saw its traffic quadruple after announcing bankruptcy, following a significant hit from Google's September helpful content update.

data.Title: Google Updates Search Console Search Appearance Documentation
data.Description: Google has updated its Search Console search appearance documentation with new details and information.

data.Title: Google Search Local Pack UX Update
data.Description: Google has rolled out a user experience update to the local pack in search results.

data.Title: Nofollow and Noindex Tags Don't Indicate Low-Quality Pages
data.Description: Google's Martin Splitt has clarified that having a large number of nofollow or noindex tags on a website does not necessarily indicate low-quality pages.

data.Title: Bing Image Search Introduces Refinement Cards
data.Description: Bing Image Search now features refinement cards within the search results interface, offering users refined search options with example photos.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Image Creator Adds Landscape Resize Option
data.Description: Bing Image Creator users can now easily transform their AI-generated square images into landscape format using the built-in Resize option.

data.Title: Reddit Attracts Advertisers with Interest-Based Targeting
data.Description: Reddit is winning over advertisers with its interest-based targeting approach, leveraging its vast network of subreddits to reach specific audiences without relying on personal data.

data.Title: Unanswered Comments Don't Impact Google Search Rankings
data.Description: Google's Martin Splitt has confirmed that unanswered comments on a website do not negatively affect search rankings.

data.Title: Google's Updated Video SEO Documentation Highlights Content Refresh Strategies
data.Description: Google's revamped Video SEO documentation emphasizes four key strategies for refreshing and improving existing content.
